LanguageData.LetterNukosPodCrash: Somebody dropped a pod here! An injured nuko climbs out... It appears to have been abandoned by its previous owner...
LanguageData.LetterXmasNukosWanderIn: Some Xmas nukos have joined your colony with a gift. Happy holidays!
LanguageData.LetterNukosPasses: A small group of nukos have wandered into the area.\n\nNukos will leave the area in a few days.
